trans-unit.id: Your Schedule is empty right now.
trans-unit.source: Your Schedule is empty right now.

trans-unit.id: Your session has expired. Please, sign in again to keep using the app.
trans-unit.source: Your session has expired. Please, sign in again to keep using the app.

Your Schedule organizes your currently watching animes by their weekday release, displaying them from Monday to Sunday. It also includes upcoming premieres from your 'Plan to Watch' list for the next 7 days. On premiere day, a simple swipe marks the first episode as watched, seamlessly transitioning it from 'Plan to Watch' to 'Watching'."
